pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flask-Orator############.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/sdispater/flask-orator.png :alt: Flask Orator Build status :target: https://travis-ci.org/sdispater/flask-oratorFlask-Orator adds `Orator ORM <https://github.com/sdispater/orator>`_ support to Flask applications.Resources=========* `Documentation <http://flask-orator.readthedocs.org>`_* `Issue Tracker <https://github.com/sdispater/flask-orator/issues>`_
